title: Participatory E-Learning-Based Agricultural Workforce Retraining: Soilless Cultivation Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Agricultural foundational knowledge and over three years of practical experience
context.additional_context: Conflict-region tailored online education for Syrian practitioners, designed with smartphone-centric access to accommodate PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish three types of soilless cultivation systems (hydroponics, aquaponics, aeroponics) and explain their application cases
Learners can analyze one agricultural problem encountered in the field and propose improvement measures using online collaboration tools.
Learners complete and submit a project proposal based on participation in five or more real-time sessions and peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
